import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card' import Header from './header' const Products = () => { const [product,setproduct] = useState([]) useEffect(()=>{ fetch('https://fakestoreapi.com/products') .then(data => data.json()) .then(result=>setproduct(result)) }) const cards = product.map(product=>(
{product.title}
)) return ( <>
{cards}
) } export default Products
